en.name: Amos’ Bow
en.passiveDescription: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further {{8//10//12//14//16%}} every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

zh.name: 阿莫斯之弓
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升{{12//15//18//21//24%}}；普通攻击与重击的箭矢发射后每经过0.1秒，伤害还会提升{{8//10//12//14//16%}}，至多提升5次。
